recommendations: Karan Kanthariaüåû ‚ÄúPrateek is a creative wizard and an execution beast. He ideated the concept of rewarding the top 30 SDRs in India. The contest saw more than 500 applicants across various companies. Prateek, almost single-handedly ideated and coordinated the entire 2-3 month contest. His emails were out of the box, his replies on email/LinkedIn were quick as lightning, and he always had a smile on his face, no matter how many questions you ask. I feel he is a capable leader, strategist, and team player. He'll surely be a great addition to any team.‚Äù

Dave Denny ‚ÄúOutworking Prateek's organisational and time management is next to impossible. The perfect amalgamation of strategy and creativity with which he operates is what makes him a true winner in any space he is put in. This keeps us wanting to work with him because there is always something to learn.‚Äù

organizations.title: NSRCEL, IIM-BANGALORE
organizations.description: The session was dedicated to the students and startup founders of Launchpad 9, sharing my experience on how I generated 8 Lakhs of revenue for Stoned Santa, using content marketing and story-telling on Quora. The session also emphasized on how startups can improve their Return on Investment by effectively targeting their user-base, through advertisements on different digital platforms.
